Retrieve Relative Citation Ratio (RCR) for PubMed IDs.

Retrieve Relative Citation Ratio (RCR) for PubMed IDs.

rcr(pmids)

Arguments

pmids

vector of PubMed IDs to retrieve (max of 1000 at a time)

Value

a data_frame the following variables:

pmid

PubMed ID

authors

publication authors

citation_count

total citations

citations_per_year

mean citations per year

expected_citations_per_year

estimated

field_citation_rate

rate relative to field

is_research_article

boolean

journal

journal name abbr.

nih_percentile

percentile

relative_citation_ratio

RCR

title

article title

year

publication year

See also

https://icite.od.nih.gov/api

Examples

pmids <- c(26001965, 25015380)
rcr(pmids)
#> # A tibble: 2 × 12
#>       pmid
#> *    <int>
#> 1 25015380
#> 2 26001965
#> # ... with 11 more variables: authors <chr>, citation_count <int>,
#> #   citations_per_year <dbl>, expected_citations_per_year <dbl>,
#> #   field_citation_rate <dbl>, is_research_article <lgl>, journal <chr>,
#> #   nih_percentile <dbl>, relative_citation_ratio <dbl>, title <chr>,
#> #   year <int>
